hanzi-su-wiki:
贈

Значения

Дарить, преподносить

Мнемоника

Увеличивать 曽 количество ценностей 貝, преподносимых в виде подарка.

Варианты

贈, 赠
purpleculture_pinyin:
zèng
to give as a present; to repel; to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
подарить; отталкивать; присвоить почетное звание после смерти (стар.)
rtega_mnemonic:
贈贈RS
赠赠		give present, bestow, confer
  • money 貝 received for something already done 曾
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 赠)
Pictophonetic: 曾 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
贈送 [ zèng sòng ]: to present as a gift
贈款 [ zèng kuǎn ]: grant
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
    • 曾 [ céng ] already, formerly, once; the past
heisig_chinese_memo: To make a present of money you need to make it be formerly yours.
heisig_constituent: presents, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, increase, formerly, horns, rice field, brains, sun, day
heisig_story: The presents offered here are money that increases each time you give it away. Do not confuse with the temporal word "present" (Frame 275).
Keyword_KANJIDIC: presents, send, give to, award to, confer on, presenting something
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: подарки, посылки, дать, премию, даровать, представляя что-то
koohiiStory1: Presents represent money that was formerly yours.
koohiiStory2: Imagine if the number of presents you get increases with each birthday. So on your first birthday, you receive just one shell as a present, but the next year it increases to two shells as presents, and so on, increasing and increasing so by the time you´re elderly, the number of shells you´ll get as presents will have increased to an awful lot of presents. GOT IT YET? PRESENTS = SHELLS + INCREASE.
jp_example_words:
寄贈(きそう): donation, presentation
贈る(おくる): send, give to, award to, confer on
贈り物(おくりもの): gift
jp_readingExamples: 贈与 (ぞうよ), 贈呈 (ぞうてい), 贈答 (ぞうとう), 贈る (おく.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You put on the shellfish mask once per year and break into people's beach houses, leaving behind presents.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You're like beach santa, except you're real and you wear a mask made of shellfish.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The "presents" you leave? They are actually just zombies (ぞう). You leave zombies in people's houses.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Ooh hoo, it's me! the Shellfish Mask Man!
I go to beach houses and leave presents where I can!
The presents are not clothes, or anything good.
I don't even care if you leave me some food.
Try whipping some up, try cooking me peas,
It matters not, I'll leave you zombies!
Tee hee hee hee hee!
Ru_Meaning: presents, send, give to, award to, confer on, presenting something

  • взятка; подкуп

  • оставлять в наследство

Ru_Radicals: ハ, 并, 日 (день), 田 (рисовое поле), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: zèng: (глаг) дарить, преподносить в подарок
Kanshudo_mnemonic: formerly (曽) a shellfish (貝), but now presented as a gift
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After you make a present of something it represents money that was formerly yours.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to " Zeng " sound. The original meaning is to give and give. "Shuowen": "Gift, play well and send each other away. Cong Bei, Zeng Sheng." "Guang Yun. "Deng Yun": "Gift, give away." Such as "Poetry. Zheng Feng. "The female says the cock crowing": "If you know your son, you can give it as a gift." "Zuo Zhuan. The Twenty-Three Years of Xi Gong: "And Song, Song Xianggong gifted the horse twenty times."

The extension of " gift " means sending away or expelling. Such as "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "Zhanmeng": "I don't want to be cute in all directions, so as to give away nightmares, so it is difficult to get rid of the epidemic." Zheng Xuan's note: "Gift, give away, I want to use new good to get rid of the old evil." And "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "The Wizard": "Gifts from the Winter Hall, there is no square or 筭." Zheng Xuan's note: "At the end of the winter, it is also possible to give ominous and nightmares with gifts. The trip must start from the hall."

" Gifts " also means to pursue the title of deceased official or honor. Such as "Han Shu. "The Legend of the Hou Yuan Dynasty": "Shang Xie, a gift like a story of a general, posthumously called Jingcheng Hou, Zi Kuang Sihou." "Hou Han Shu. "The Biographies of Deng Kou": "Five years, Li and Chang died one after another, both of them were buried with burial. They were not gifted by the nobles, and the queen mother followed them."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to " Zeng " sound. The original meaning is to give and give.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「曾」聲。本義是贈送、送給。《說文》：「贈，玩好相送也。从貝，曾聲。」《廣韻．嶝韻》：「贈，相送也。」如《詩．鄭風．女曰雞鳴》：「知子之來之，雜佩以贈之。」《左傳．僖公二十三年》：「及宋，宋襄公贈之以馬二十乘。」

　　「贈」引申表示送走、驅除。如《周禮．春官．占夢》：「乃舍萌于四方，以贈惡夢，遂令始難敺疫。」鄭玄注：「贈，送也，欲以新善去故惡。」又《周禮．春官．男巫》：「冬堂贈，無方無筭。」鄭玄注：「冬歲終，以禮送不祥及惡夢，皆是也。其行必由堂始。」

　　「贈」也表示追封死者官爵或榮譽的稱號。如《漢書．元后傳》：「商薨，弔贈如大將軍故事，諡曰景成侯，子況嗣侯。」《後漢書．鄧寇列傳》：「五年，悝、閶相繼並卒，皆遺言薄葬，不受爵贈，太后並從之。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「曾」聲。本義是贈送、送給。

③驅除：以贈惡夢。

從「 貝 」，「 曾 」聲。本義是贈送、送給。《說文》：「贈，玩好相送也。从貝，曾聲。」《廣韻．嶝韻》：「贈，相送也。」如《詩．鄭風．女曰雞鳴》：「知子之來之，雜佩以贈之。」《左傳．僖公二十三年》：「及宋，宋襄公贈之以馬二十乘。」 「 贈 」引申表示送走、驅除。如《周禮．春官．占夢》：「乃舍萌于四方，以贈惡夢，遂令始難敺疫。」鄭玄注：「贈，送也，欲以新善去故惡。」又《周禮．春官．男巫》：「冬堂贈，無方無筭。」鄭玄注：「冬歲終，以禮送不祥及惡夢，皆是也。其行必由堂始。」 「 贈 」也表示追封死者官爵或榮譽的稱號。如《漢書．元后傳》：「商薨，弔贈如大將軍故事，諡曰景成侯，子況嗣侯。」《後漢書．鄧寇列傳》：「五年，悝、閶相繼並卒，皆遺言薄葬，不受爵贈，太后並從之。」
From " Bei" to " Zeng" sound. The original meaning is to give and give. "Shuowen": "Gift, play well and send each other away. Cong Bei, Zeng Sheng." "Guang Yun. "Deng Yun": "Gift, give away." Such as "Poetry. Zheng Feng. "The female says the cock crowing": "If you know your son, you can give it as a gift." "Zuo Zhuan. The Twenty-Three Years of Xi Gong: "And Song, Song Xianggong gifted the horse twenty times." The extension of " gift" means sending away or expelling. Such as "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "Zhanmeng": "I don't want to be cute in all directions, so as to give away nightmares, so it is difficult to get rid of the epidemic." Zheng Xuan's note: "Gift, give away, I want to use new good to get rid of the old evil." And "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "The Wizard": "Gifts from the Winter Hall, there is no square or 筭." Zheng Xuan's note: "At the end of the winter, it is also possible to give ominous and nightmares with gifts. The trip must start from the hall." " Gifts" also means to pursue the title of deceased official or honor. Such as "Han Shu. "The Legend of the Hou Yuan Dynasty": "Shang Xie, a gift like a story of a general, posthumously called Jingcheng Hou, Zi Kuang Sihou." "Hou Han Shu. "The Biographies of Deng Kou": "Five years, Li and Chang died one after another, both of them were buried with burial. They were not gifted by the nobles, and the queen mother followed them."

zèng
вм. 赠
Radicals: 貝, 曽  (shellfish, mask)
Meaning Mnemonic
You put on the shellfish mask once per year and break into people's beach houses, leaving behind presents.
You're like beach santa, except you're real and you wear a mask made of shellfish.
Reading Mnemonic
The "presents" you leave? They are actually just zombies (ぞう). You leave zombies in people's houses.
Ooh hoo, it's me! the Shellfish Mask Man!
I go to beach houses and leave presents where I can!
The presents are not clothes, or anything good.
I don't even care if you leave me some food.
Try whipping some up, try cooking me peas,
It matters not, I'll leave you zombies!
Tee hee hee hee hee!
